DataElement.preferredName: Priapism Greater Than or Equal To 1 Incidence Occurrence Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not one or more incidences of priapism occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Priapism Greater Than or Equal To 1 Incidence Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Persistent and usually painful erection that lasts for at least four hours in the absence of physical or psychological stimulation, which can be caused by hematologic disorders, including sickle cell disease and leukemia, spinal cord injuries, and medications._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::1_The number of new cases of a disease diagnosed each year._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Persistent and usually painful erection that lasts for at least four hours in the absence of physical or psychological stimulation, which can be caused by hematologic disorders, including sickle cell disease and leukemia, spinal cord injuries, and medications.

Concepts.definition: Persistent and usually painful erection that lasts for at least four hours in the absence of physical or psychological stimulation, which can be caused by hematologic disorders, including sickle cell disease and leukemia, spinal cord injuries, and medications.

Property.preferredName: Greater Than or Equal To Integer::1 Incidence Occurrence
Property.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::1:The number of new cases of a disease diagnosed each year.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The relative frequency of occurrence of something.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.
